text: Cecil John Harry "Cec" Purves (born October 18, 1933) is a Canadian politician and businessman. He was born in Edmonton, Alberta. Purves was the 30th Mayor of Edmonton from 1977 through 1983 as an Independent.Edmonton Public Library biography of Cec Purves ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Edmonton biography of Cec Purves Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian mayors Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Edmonton
title: Cec Purves
